questions.question_text: Which Cisco platform processes behavior baselines, monitors for deviations, and reviews for malicious processes in data center traffic and servers while performing software vulnerability detection?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Yep, Cisco Secure Workload.

Selected Answer: A
A of course.

questions.question_text: A network administrator has installed Secure Endpoint in the network. During setup it was noticed an endpoint has been exhibiting unusual behavior, including slow performance and unexpected network activity. Administrator discovers a suspicious file named abc0467145535.exe running in the background. Which step must the network administrator take to investigate and remediate the potential malware?

choices.D: Disable all non-essential processes running on the endpoint.
choices.A: Isolate the endpoint from the network.
choices.B: Reset the endpoint password and enable multi-factor authentication.
choices.C: Format and reinstall the operating system on the endpoint.

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: CE
C and E
it can be caused due to poor input validation or through non image validation

Selected Answer: BC
As well as I understand, the targets are the cookie or a user input. This is what a hacker aims to get. The methods (to get the cookie or input) can be modifying the image type input, or modifying the header of an http request.
I think it should be C and E

questions.question_text: What are two targets in cross-site scripting attacks? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
NHRP is a client and server protocol where the hub is the Next Hop Server (NHS) and the spokes are the Next Hop Clients (NHCs). The hub maintains an NHRP database of the public interface addresses of each spoke. Each spoke registers its real address when it boots and queries the NHRP database for real addresses of the destination spokes to build direct tunnels.

NHRP Resolution. NHRP allows one NHC (spoke) to dynamically discover the logical VPN IP to physical NBMA IP mapping for another NHC (spoke) within the same NBMA network.

questions.question_text: Which component performs the resolution between the tunnel address and mGRE address in DMVPN?

//IMG//
Refer to the exhibit. A network engineer must retrieve the interface configuration on a Cisco router by using the NETCONF API. The engineer uses a Python script to automate the activity. Which code snippet completes the script?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
You get an accept "application/vnd.yang.data+json" so it has to be B

comments.content:
I the Demon Queen was bested by this question of the humiliation as I did not notice the "application/vnd.yang.data+json"

I was defeated by an obvious answer I missed even though it was in front of me the whole time....
Hmm - question asks about NETCONF API - must be a typo as this is an XML based API

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: B
I believe B. to be the correct answer here
